amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require voting registration materials to be sent with notification of restoration of rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Moore.
